titleStmt.title: Votes and declarations of both Houses of Parliament concerning the taking away and disanulling the power of the clergie in making constitutions with a declaration prohibiting the reading in all churches, chappells, and else where, His Maiesties proclamations, declarations, and other printed papers of the same nature and consequence.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: "Mercurii 12. Iuly 1642. Ordered by the Lords and Commons in Parliament, that these ... be forthwith printed and published. Io. Brown Clarc. [sic] Parl."
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
